actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to permit a State legislature to contest the redesignation under such Act of an area within such State by an Indian tribe, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to permit a State legislature to contest the redesignation of an air quality control region within such State by an Indian tribe by requesting intervention by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to permit a State legislature to contest the redesignation under such Act of an area within such State by an Indian tribe, and for other purposes.
